comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is a painting/illustration of General Billy Mitchell by artist Peter Hurd (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Hurd). See: Oddly enough, the original illustration features the silhouette of the Convair B-58 Hustler in the sky, which makes sense considering Mitchell's role in the promotion of air power and the potential of aerial bombing. Here, it seems the Hustler silhouette is still there, but now almost completely covered over by an illustration of a Space Shuttle.
